feed.title: Spark NLP
feed.subtitle: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark

entry.title: Basic NLP Pipeline for Spanish from TEMU_BSC for PlanTL

link.title: Basic NLP Pipeline for Spanish from TEMU_BSC for PlanTL

entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Basic NLP pipeline, by TEMU-BSC for PlanTL-GOB-ES, with Tokenization, lemmatization, NER, embeddings and Normalization, using roberta_base_bne transformer.

Download

How to use

import sparknlp spark = sparknlp.start()

from sparknlp.annotator import * from sparknlp.base import * pipeline = PretrainedPipeline(“pipeline_bsc_roberta_base_bne”, “es”, “@cayorodriguez”) from sparknlp.base import LightPipeline

light_model = LightPipeline(pipeline) text = “La Reserva Federal de el Gobierno de EE UU aprueba una de las mayorores subidas de tipos de interés desde 1994.” light_result = light_model.annotate(text)

result = pipeline.annotate(““Veo al hombre de los Estados Unidos con el telescopio””)

import sparknlp
spark = sparknlp.start()

from sparknlp.annotator import *
from sparknlp.base import *
pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("pipeline_bsc_roberta_base_bne", "es", "@cayorodriguez")
from sparknlp.base import LightPipeline

light_model = LightPipeline(pipeline)
text = "La Reserva Federal de el Gobierno de EE UU aprueba una de las mayorores subidas de tipos de interés desde 1994."
light_result = light_model.annotate(text)


result = pipeline.annotate(""Veo al hombre de los Estados Unidos con el telescopio"")

Model Information

Model Name: pipeline_bsc_roberta_base_bne
Type: pipeline
Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.0.0+
License: Open Source
Edition: Community
Language: es
Size: 2.0 GB
Dependencies: roberta_base_bne

Included Models

  • DocumentAssembler
  • SentenceDetectorDLModel
  • TokenizerModel
  • NormalizerModel
  • StopWordsCleaner
  • RoBertaEmbeddings
  • SentenceEmbeddings
  • EmbeddingsFinisher
  • LemmatizerModel
  • RoBertaForTokenClassification
  • RoBertaForTokenClassification
  • NerConverter
entry.summary: Description Pretrained Basic NLP pipeline, by TEMU-BSC for PlanTL-GOB-ES, with Tokenization, lemmatization, NER, embeddings and Normalization, using roberta_base_bne transformer. Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use import sparknlp spark = sparknlp.start() from sparknlp.annotator import * from sparknlp.base import * pipeline = PretrainedPipeline(“pipeline_bsc_roberta_base_bne”, “es”, “@cayorodriguez”) from sparknlp.base import LightPipeline light_model = LightPipeline(pipeline) text = “La Reserva Federal de el Gobierno de EE UU aprueba una de las mayorores subidas de tipos de interés desde 1994.” light_result = light_model.annotate(text) result = pipeline.annotate(““Veo al hombre de los Estados Unidos con el telescopio””) PythonScalaNLU import sparknlp spark = sparknlp.start() from sparknlp.annotator import * from sparknlp.base import * pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("pipeline_bsc_roberta_base_bne", "es", "@cayorodriguez") from sparknlp.base import LightPipeline light_model = LightPipeline(pipeline) text = "La Reserva Federal de el Gobierno de EE UU aprueba una de las mayorores subidas de tipos de interés desde 1994." light_result = light_model.annotate(text) result = pipeline.annotate(""Veo al hombre de los Estados Unidos con el telescopio"") Model Information Model Name: pipeline_bsc_roberta_base_bne Type: pipeline Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.0.0+ License: Open Source Edition: Community Language: es Size: 2.0 GB Dependencies: roberta_base_bne Included Models DocumentAssembler SentenceDetectorDLModel TokenizerModel NormalizerModel StopWordsCleaner RoBertaEmbeddings SentenceEmbeddings EmbeddingsFinisher LemmatizerModel RoBertaForTokenClassification RoBertaForTokenClassification NerConverter

entry.title: Spanish Named Entity Recognition, (RoBERTa base trained with data from the National Library of Spain (BNE) and CONLL 2003 data), by the TEMU Unit of the BSC-CNS

link.title: Spanish Named Entity Recognition, (RoBERTa base trained with data from the National Library of Spain (BNE) and CONLL 2003 data), by the TEMU Unit of the BSC-CNS

entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Named Entity Recognition model, uploaded to Hugging Face, adapted and imported into Spark NLP. roberta-base-bne-conll-ner_spark_nlp is a Spanish model orginally trained by TEMU-BSC for PlanTL-GOB-ES.

Predicted Entities

Download

How to use

documentAssembler = DocumentAssembler()
.setInputCol(“text”)
.setOutputCol(“document”)

sentenceDetector = SentenceDetector()
.setInputCols([“document”])
.setOutputCol(“sentence”)

tokenizer = Tokenizer()
.setInputCols(“sentence”)
.setOutputCol(“token”)

ner = RoBertaForTokenClassification.pretrained(“roberta_base_bne_conll_ner_spark_nlp”,”es”)
.setInputCols([“sentence”, “token”])
.setOutputCol(“ner”)

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[documentAssembler, tokenizer, ner])

data = spark.createDataFrame([[“El Plan Nacional para el Impulso de las Tecnologías del Lenguage es una iniciativa del Gobierno de España”]]).toDF(“text”)

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

documentAssembler = DocumentAssembler() \
    .setInputCol("text") \
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentenceDetector = SentenceDetector()\
.setInputCols(["document"])\
.setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer() \
    .setInputCols("sentence") \
    .setOutputCol("token")
  
ner = RoBertaForTokenClassification.pretrained("roberta_base_bne_conll_ner_spark_nlp","es") \
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"]) \
    .setOutputCol("ner")
    
pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[documentAssembler, tokenizer, ner])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["El Plan Nacional para el Impulso de las Tecnologías del Lenguage es una iniciativa del Gobierno de España"]]).toDF("text")

Model Information

Model Name: roberta_base_bne_conll_ner_spark_nlp
Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.0.0+
License: Open Source
Edition: Community
Input Labels: [document, token]
Output Labels: [ner]
Language: es
Size: 447.3 MB
Case sensitive: true
Max sentence length: 128
entry.summary: Description Pretrained Named Entity Recognition model, uploaded to Hugging Face, adapted and imported into Spark NLP. roberta-base-bne-conll-ner_spark_nlp is a Spanish model orginally trained by TEMU-BSC for PlanTL-GOB-ES. Predicted Entities Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use documentAssembler = DocumentAssembler() .setInputCol(“text”) .setOutputCol(“document”) sentenceDetector = SentenceDetector() .setInputCols([“document”]) .setOutputCol(“sentence”) tokenizer = Tokenizer() .setInputCols(“sentence”) .setOutputCol(“token”) ner = RoBertaForTokenClassification.pretrained(“roberta_base_bne_conll_ner_spark_nlp”,”es”) .setInputCols([“sentence”, “token”]) .setOutputCol(“ner”) pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[documentAssembler, tokenizer, ner]) data = spark.createDataFrame([[“El Plan Nacional para el Impulso de las Tecnologías del Lenguage es una iniciativa del Gobierno de España”]]).toDF(“text”) result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data) PythonScalaNLU documentAssembler = DocumentAssembler() \ .setInputCol("text") \ .setOutputCol("document") sentenceDetector = SentenceDetector()\ .setInputCols(["document"])\ .setOutputCol("sentence") tokenizer = Tokenizer() \ .setInputCols("sentence") \ .setOutputCol("token") ner = RoBertaForTokenClassification.pretrained("roberta_base_bne_conll_ner_spark_nlp","es") \ .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"]) \ .setOutputCol("ner") pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[documentAssembler, tokenizer, ner]) data = spark.createDataFrame([["El Plan Nacional para el Impulso de las Tecnologías del Lenguage es una iniciativa del Gobierno de España"]]).toDF("text") Model Information Model Name: roberta_base_bne_conll_ner_spark_nlp Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.0.0+ License: Open Source Edition: Community Input Labels: [document, token] Output Labels: [ner] Language: es Size: 447.3 MB Case sensitive: true Max sentence length: 128

entry.title: Spanish Legal Longformer Embeddings (from Narrativa)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Longformer Embeddings model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP. longformer_legal_embeddings is a Spanish model originally trained by Narrative.

Download

How to use


 embeddings = LongformerEmbeddings\
.pretrained("longformer_legal_embeddings","es")\
.setInputCols(["document", "token"])\
.setOutputCol("embeddings")



val embeddings = LongformerEmbeddings.pretrained("longformer_legal_embeddings","es")
.setInputCols("document", "token") 
.setOutputCol("embeddings")

Model Information

Model Name: longformer_legal_embeddings
Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.2.0+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [sentence, token]
Output Labels: [embeddings]
Language: es
Size: 564.1 MB
Case sensitive: true
Max sentence length: 4096

References

https://huggingface.co/Narrativa/legal-longformer-base-4096-spanish
entry.summary: Description Pretrained Longformer Embeddings model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP. longformer_legal_embeddings is a Spanish model originally trained by Narrative. Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use PythonScalaNLU embeddings = LongformerEmbeddings\ .pretrained("longformer_legal_embeddings","es")\ .setInputCols(["document", "token"])\ .setOutputCol("embeddings") val embeddings = LongformerEmbeddings.pretrained("longformer_legal_embeddings","es") .setInputCols("document", "token") .setOutputCol("embeddings") Model Information Model Name: longformer_legal_embeddings Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.2.0+ License: Open Source Edition: Official Input Labels: [sentence, token] Output Labels: [embeddings] Language: es Size: 564.1 MB Case sensitive: true Max sentence length: 4096 References https://huggingface.co/Narrativa/legal-longformer-base-4096-spanish

entry.title: Spanish CBOW Legal Fast Text Embeddings (Cased, D100)

link.title: Spanish CBOW Legal Fast Text Embeddings (Cased, D100)

entry.content:
Description

Word Embeddings lookup annotator that maps tokens to vectors. In CBOW the distributed representations of context (or surrounding words) are combined to predict the word in the middle.

Download

How to use

 
model = WordEmbeddingsModel.pretrained("word2vec_cbow_legal_d100_cased","es")\
	            .setInputCols(["document","token"])\
	            .setOutputCol("word_embeddings")



val model = WordEmbeddingsModel.pretrained("word2vec_cbow_legal_d100_cased","es")
	                .setInputCols("document","token")
	                .setOutputCol("word_embeddings")

Model Information

Model Name: word2vec_cbow_legal_d100_cased
Type: embeddings
Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.2.1+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [document, token]
Output Labels: [embeddings]
Language: es
Size: 387.4 MB
Case sensitive: false
Dimension: 300

References

https://zenodo.org/record/5036147#.Y3Op0XZBxD-
entry.summary: Description Word Embeddings lookup annotator that maps tokens to vectors. In CBOW the distributed representations of context (or surrounding words) are combined to predict the word in the middle. entry.title: Spanish Skipgram Legal Fast Text Embeddings (Cased, D100)

link.title: Spanish Skipgram Legal Fast Text Embeddings (Cased, D100)

entry.content:
Description

Word Embeddings lookup annotator that maps tokens to vectors. In the Skip-gram model, the distributed representation of the input word is used to predict the context.

Download

How to use

 
model = WordEmbeddingsModel.pretrained("word2vec_skipgram_legal_d100_cased","es")\
	            .setInputCols(["document","token"])\
	            .setOutputCol("word_embeddings")



val model = WordEmbeddingsModel.pretrained("word2vec_skipgram_legal_d100_cased","es")
	                .setInputCols("document","token")
	                .setOutputCol("word_embeddings")

Model Information

Model Name: word2vec_skipgram_legal_d100_cased
Type: embeddings
Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.2.1+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [document, token]
Output Labels: [embeddings]
Language: es
Size: 336.3 MB
Case sensitive: false
Dimension: 100

References

https://zenodo.org/record/5036147#.Y3Op0XZBxD-
